text:
```julia> foo(a, b) = a + b
foo (generic function with 2 methods)

julia> .+
Base.Broadcast.BroadcastFunction(+)

julia> .foo
ERROR: syntax: invalid identifier name "."
Stacktrace:
 [1] top-level scope
   @ none:1```
